title: Climbing Mount Salbarii
atmosphere: Increasingly harsh as altitude rises. Thin atmosphere, cold, rocky terrain. The mountain looms above, crater invisible from below. Physical challenge intensifies with each stage.
description: Multi-stage climb from 500m to 1400m altitude to reach the crater where Highndry is parked. Physical endurance and skill testing throughout.
duration: Several hours to full day depending on pace and conditions

triggers.entry: Travellers depart from vehicle at 500m altitude

stages.name: Lower Slopes
stages.description: Steep slope with frequent detours around rock faces. Option for shortcut climb.
stages.objective: Navigate from 500m to 900m, choosing between safe detours or risky shortcut

obstacle.description: Steep rock faces block direct ascent, requiring detours or climbing
obstacle.resolution: Take slow detours around obstacles, or attempt shortcut climb

discoveries.content: A climbable outcrop offers a shortcut but requires Athletics check
Studying the rock reveals hand-holds; improves climb chances

skill_checks.on_failure: Falls, takes damage, must use detour anyway

stages.name: Middle Ascent
stages.description: Altitude effects begin. Fast pace risks sickness.
stages.objective: Maintain pace while managing altitude effects

obstacle.description: Altitude effects begin at this elevation, DM-2 on all checks
obstacle.resolution: Slow pace to avoid sickness, or push through with risk

discoveries.content: Watching the party's pace reveals who handles altitude well
Conserving oxygen supplies now will help at higher elevations

skill_checks.on_failure: Mild altitude sickness, DM-2 on all checks

stages.name: Upper Slopes
stages.description: Steep, rocky terrain. Altitude effects worsen.
stages.objective: Push through worsening conditions to reach scramble zone

obstacle.description: Altitude effects worsen, terrain becomes more treacherous
obstacle.resolution: Steady pace and careful footing, use oxygen if needed

discoveries.content: The scramble zone above looks challenging; loose rock visible

skill_checks.on_failure: Moderate altitude sickness, DM-4 on all checks

stages.name: Scramble Zone
stages.description: Hazardous scrambling over loose rock. Risk of falls.
stages.objective: Navigate hazardous loose rock without injury

obstacle.description: Loose rock and unstable footing threaten falls and injury
obstacle.resolution: Careful movement, test handholds, help struggling party members

discoveries.content: Recon skill reveals safest path through the scramble
First glimpse of the crater rim above, goal is in sight

skill_checks.on_failure: Slip and fall, take 1D damage, lose time

stages.name: Final Ascent
stages.description: Almost sheer rock face to crater lip.
stages.objective: Complete the final climb to the crater rim

obstacle.description: Near-vertical rock face requires technical climbing
obstacle.resolution: Use climbing gear, rope work, help exhausted climbers

discoveries.content: From the crater lip, Highndry is visible below in the crater

skill_checks.on_failure: Severe altitude sickness, DM-6 on all checks

stages.name: Crater Descent
stages.description: Climb down into crater where Highndry waits.
stages.objective: Descend safely to reach the ship

obstacle.description: Downclimb into crater, fatigue and altitude effects compound risk
obstacle.resolution: Careful descent, rope work, take frequent rests

discoveries.content: Highndry appears intact from above, no obvious external damage
The crater floor is relatively flat, good landing zone for future reference

skill_checks.on_failure: Rough landing, minor injuries, but reach the ship

altitude_sickness.moderate: DM-4 on all checks, nausea, headache, mental numbness
altitude_sickness.severe: DM-6 on all checks, incapacitation risk

narrator_prompt: Mount Salbarii tests the Travellers physically and mentally. Each stage is harder than the last. The thin atmosphere saps strength, the cold numbs fingers, the loose rock threatens falls. But somewhere up there, in the crater, their ship is waiting.
